public.screen_title: Quickly integrate cryptocurrency payments into your website or app

frame.remark_1: Cryptocurrency offers customers and merchants the highest privacy and security.
frame.remark_2: Using borderless encrypted payments, you can operate your business worldwide, breaking through geographical and national boundaries.
frame.remark_3: Mature interface solutions can be docked within 5 working days. Rich docking development experience helps customers occupy the market as quickly as possible.
frame.remark_title_5: DO efficiently clears and settles, saves complicated processes, and makes on-chain settlement more timely.
frame.remark_title_6: Using the HLWZC payment platform, you can enjoy ultra-low handling fees worldwide.

footer.remark: A currency payment platform covering the world, dedicated to solving the global payment problem of enterprises, providing enterprises with secure, convenient and privacy-protecting blockchain online payment services, enterprises can choose stable currency, Bitcoin through the payment platform As well as other tokens to complete collection and payment on a global scale, it is easier to expand business globally and achieve globalization.

demo.title: You can experience the recharge process here
demo.recharge_remark: Sending any currency other than {{value}} to this address will result in a permanent deposit loss.
